text: The Maserati MC12 was a sports car that was built by the Maserati company from 2004 to 2005. There were only 50 cars that were produced. The MC12 was closely based on the Enzo Ferrari. The MC12 was succeeded by the Maserati MC12 Corsa in 2006. ==Other websites== *Maserati MC12's Official website Category:Maserati automobiles Category:Sports cars Category:2000s automobiles
title: Maserati MC12
